channel.title: Publishing on fardog.io
channel.description: Recent content in Publishing on fardog.io

item.title: Automatically publishing websites with Hugo, Travis, and Github
item.description: Welcome to the new fardog.io: an HTTPS website which is hosted for free, easy to maintain, and automatically built when I push updates to a git repository. It’s backed by Hugo, Travis-CI, GitHub, and Cloudflare. Although I don’t intend for this article to be a complete how-to of launching a site like this, hopefully it gives you a basis to piece together how you can build your own. A History This site is rebuilt from the ashes of milkandtang.
